title: Asian Stocks Drop After Wall Street, Bonds Steady: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks retreated on Wednesday, tracking a selloff on Wall Street as the US-Europe trade conflict over Greenland and a turmoil in bond markets rattled investors. Gold hit a fresh record.
content: Asian stocks retreated on Wednesday, tracking a selloff on Wall Street as the US-Europe trade conflict over Greenland and a turmoil in bond markets rattled investors. Gold hit a fresh record.
